Posts.EditableText:
Hi Forum!

I have been searching through various forum post but wasn't able to find an answer. Is there a way to set an image to the gridpanel background? I have stumbled across GridImageLib.asxl but that only allowed for me to add to specific rooms (Which is actually awesome!)
